title: Mouton Vert
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Mediterranean, Take-out, Bakery, Greek
description: Take away vegetarian and vegan food shop with limited seating, operating since Jul 2014. Specializes in Greek cuisine. Offers prepared food and baked goods that changes daily and might include cheese-less pizza, skordalia, chocolate mousse, cabbage rolls, lasagna, cupcakes, mayonnaise, and others. Sells olives, oil, coffee beans.
